text:
ime axis: The first row of the time axis (“Time”) is to register the actual time for each 
observation, while the second row (“Hours”) identifies the number of hours that have 
elapsed during the course of labour (see Fig. 2). The “Time” row is divided into columns for 
recording the actual time in hours and minutes. Each column represents 1 clock hour. 
As described in the example below, if the first assessment is conducted at 06:30 and the 
second and third assessments are conducted 1 and 2 ho
